load('../../Data/gwps.RData')

# set palette
ggplot <- function(...) ggplot2::ggplot(...) + scale_color_brewer(palette="Set2") + scale_fill_brewer(palette="Set2")

uncertainties <- data.frame(gas=c('CO2 FFI','CO2 Land use','CH4','N2O','Fgas','GHG'),
                            uncertainty=c(0.08,0.5,0.2,0.6,0.2,0.1))


wb <- openxlsx::createWorkbook(title = paste("ipcc_ar6_region_plot",Sys.Date()))

```{r gather_data, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,fig.width=8,fig.height=4}

## sum GHG emissions for each region

plot_data <- edgar_GHG_ar6 %>% 
  filter(year>1989) %>% 
  filter(year<2019) %>% 
  group_by(year,region_ar6_5,region_ar6_5_short,region_ar6_10) %>% 
  summarise(value=sum(GHG,na.rm=TRUE)/1e9) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(region_ar6_5_short=as.character(region_ar6_5_short))


## group aviation and shipping into a single region

plot_data <- plot_data %>%
  mutate(region_ar6_5=ifelse(region_ar6_5_short=="AIR","Intl. Shipping & Aviation",region_ar6_5)) %>% 
  mutate(region_ar6_5=ifelse(region_ar6_5_short=="SEA","Intl. Shipping & Aviation",region_ar6_5)) %>%  
  mutate(region_ar6_5_short=ifelse(region_ar6_5=="Intl. Shipping & Aviation","AIRSEA",region_ar6_5_short))


## Add land use CO2

plot_data <- left_join(plot_data,land %>% select(region_ar6_10,year,mean),by=c("year","region_ar6_10"))
plot_data <- plot_data %>% 
  mutate(mean=mean/1e9) %>% 
  mutate(value=ifelse(region_ar6_5_short!="AIRSEA",value+mean,value))


## combine everything

plot_data <- plot_data %>% 
  group_by(year,region_ar6_5,region_ar6_5_short) %>%
  mutate(value=sum(value)) %>%
  select(-region_ar6_10,-mean) %>% 
  unique() %>% 
  ungroup()

## adjust levels

plot_data$region_ar6_5_short <- as.factor(plot_data$region_ar6_5_short)
plot_data$region_ar6_5_short <-  factor(plot_data$region_ar6_5_short,levels(plot_data$region_ar6_5_short)[c(2,3,4,5,6,1)])

plot_data$region_ar6_5 <- as.factor(plot_data$region_ar6_5)
plot_data$region_ar6_5 <-  factor(plot_data$region_ar6_5,levels(plot_data$region_ar6_5)[c(2,3,4,5,6,1)])


```

```{r trend_plot, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,fig.width=8,fig.height=4}


shares <- plot_data %>% 
  filter(year %in% c(1990,2000,2010,2018)) %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  mutate(totals=sum(value)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  group_by(year,region_ar6_5_short) %>% 
  mutate(fractions=(value/totals)*100)

shares <- locate_shares(shares,"region_ar6_5_short",4)

line_data <- data.frame(x=c(1990,1990,2000,2000,2010,2010,2018,2018),y=c(0,60))

p1 <- plot_data %>%
  ggplot(.,aes(x=year,y=value,fill=region_ar6_5_short)) +
  geom_area(colour="#737373") +
  
  geom_text(data=shares,aes(x=year+1,y=location,label=paste(round(fractions,0),"%",sep="")),size=3.5,colour="#252525")+
  
  geom_line(inherit.aes = FALSE,data=line_data,aes(x=x,y=y,group=x),alpha=0.3,linetype="dashed")  +
  
  #### text with the totals
  geom_text(data=shares %>% filter(region_ar6_5_short=="AIRSEA"),aes(x=year,y=62,label=paste(round(totals,1),  "Gt")),size=3.5,colour="#252525")+
  
  #### labels
  geom_text(data=shares %>% filter(year==2018),aes(x=2020,y=location,label=str_wrap(region_ar6_5,width=28),color=region_ar6_5_short),hjust=0) +
  
  
  scale_y_continuous(breaks=c(0,10,20,30,40,50,60)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(1990,2000,2010,2018)) +
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(1990,2032), # This focuses the x-axis on the range of interest
                      clip = 'off') +
  big_trend_theme +
  theme(legend.position="none",
        title = element_text(size=10),
        #plot.margin = unit(c(5.5,150,5.5,5.5),"points")
        ) +
  ylab('GHG Emissions (GtCO2eq/yr)') +
  ggtitle("a. Trends in global and regional greenhouse gas emissions")

p1

```


```{r benchmark_data, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,fig.width=8,fig.height=3}


## import scenario data

scenario_data <- read.csv("../../Data/supplemetary data/Emission reduction benchmarks.csv")

scenario_data <- scenario_data %>% 
  rename(rate=reduction_rates_2020.2040) %>% #can be changed
  filter(rate>-25) %>% 
  #filter(is.na(rate)) %>% 
  filter(aggregated_category!="Other") %>% 
  select(aggregated_category,rate) %>% 
  mutate(aggregated_category=as.character(aggregated_category))

scenario_data <- scenario_data %>% 
  mutate(aggregated_category=ifelse(aggregated_category=="1.5C","1.5oC warming",aggregated_category)) %>% 
  mutate(aggregated_category=ifelse(aggregated_category=="High 2C","2oC warming (>50% probability)",aggregated_category)) %>% 
  mutate(aggregated_category=ifelse(aggregated_category=="Low 2C","2oC warming (>66% probability)",aggregated_category))

scenario_data <- scenario_data %>% 
  mutate(country="x") %>% 
  mutate(facet="Scenario reduction rates (2020-2040)") %>% 
  select(country,aggregated_category,rate,facet)


## calculate region rates of change

region_rates <- edgar_GHG_ar6 %>% 
  filter(region_ar6_5_short!="AIR") %>% 
  filter(region_ar6_5_short!="SEA") %>% 
  group_by(country,ISO,year,region_ar6_5,region_ar6_5_short) %>% 
  summarise(GHG=sum(GHG,na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  rename(emissions_total=GHG)

##### regions
time_start = 2010

# check this!!
region_rates <- region_rates %>% 
  filter(ISO!="COK") %>% 
  filter(ISO!="FRO") %>% 
  filter(ISO!="GRL") %>% 
  filter(ISO!="IMN") %>% 
  filter(year>=time_start & year<2019) %>% 
  group_by(country,year,region_ar6_5) %>% 
  summarise(emissions_total=sum(emissions_total,na.rm=TRUE))

region_rates <- region_rates %>% 
  group_by(country,region_ar6_5) %>% 
  summarise(rate=(last(emissions_total)/first(emissions_total))^(1/(last(year)-time_start))-1) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(rate=rate*100) %>% 
  mutate(aggregated_category=region_ar6_5) %>% 
  select(country,aggregated_category,rate) %>% 
  mutate(facet="Annual emissions change (2010-2018)")
  
#blarg <- rbind(blarg,benchmark_data %>% mutate(facet="Scenarios (2020-2050)"))
region_rates <- rbind(region_rates,scenario_data)

region_rates <- region_rates %>% 
  mutate(aggregated_category = as.factor(aggregated_category))

region_rates$aggregated_category <- factor(region_rates$aggregated_category,levels= levels(region_rates$aggregated_category)[c(4,5,6,7,8,1,3,2)])

p2 <- region_rates %>% 
  ggplot(.,aes(x=fct_rev(aggregated_category),rate,fill=aggregated_category)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept=0,color="#636363") +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_x_discrete(labels = function(aggregated_category) str_wrap(aggregated_category, width = 12)) +
  facet_grid(.~facet,scales="free",space="free") +
  theme_bw() +
  ylab(str_wrap("Average annual GHG emissions growth rates (%)",width=27)) +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none",
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        title = element_text(size=10)) +
  ggtitle("b. Recent emission change by region vs. rates compatible with warming targets")
p2


```
